[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_margin_tablet=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||true|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_font=”Fira Sans Condensed|700|||||||” text_font_size=”22px” header_font=”Playfair Display|700|||||||” header_font_size=”60px” header_3_font=”Fira Sans Condensed|700|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#60cae4″ custom_margin=”50px||35px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”50px||35px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”||||false|false”]

The Design-Build Process 

Design-build isn’t remodeling – it’s even better!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_image=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Davis-remodel-portfolio-9.jpg” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_enable_color=”off” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”60px|30px|60px|30px|false|true”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ min_height=”402px” custom_margin=”80px||80px|||”]

We design it. We build it. You love it.

Our proven design-build philosophy eliminates the hassles, headaches, and disappointment associated with home remodeling projects. From beginning to end, we do everything: design, build, project management, and so much more. Our success is built on:

Preparation – Design and construction teams work in concert as one seamless unit, eliminating the confusion and problems associated with the old-school home remodeling.

Communication – We talk with each other — and with you — throughout the process. Regular check-ins and status updates give you peace-of-mind and confidence.

Execution – We work quickly and efficiently, always delivering on our promises.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″ min_height=”1125px” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_image src=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Davis-remodel-portfolio-9.jpg” _builder_version=”3.29.3″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ min_height=”402px” custom_margin=”10px|||||”]

We design it. We build it. You love it.

Our proven design-build philosophy eliminates the hassles, headaches, and disappointment associated with home remodeling projects. From beginning to end, we do everything: design, build, project management, and so much more. Our success is built on:

Preparation – Design and construction teams work in concert as one seamless unit, eliminating the confusion and problems associated with the old-school home remodeling.

Communication – We talk with each other — and with you — throughout the process. Regular check-ins and status updates give you peace-of-mind and confidence.

Execution – We work quickly and efficiently, always delivering on our promises.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_margin=”30px|||||” custom_padding=”30px||0px|||”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ disabled_on=”on|off|off” _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

1. A conversation and in-home consultation

 
Every design-build project starts with a phone call to learn about you, your home, and what you’re imagining. If we both think we might be a good fit, we’ll schedule a complimentary in-home meeting to learn more and start getting inspired.

At this meeting we discuss design ideas, scope of project, timelines, budget, retainer and process. We also provide an estimated price range of what your project would cost based on our discussion. [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_image src=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Erin-and-Scott-Laughing-tall.jpg” title_text=”Erin and Scott Laughing tall” show_bottom_space=”off” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ disabled_on=”on|off|off” _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_image src=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Collaborating-with-Design-Build.jpg” alt=”Collaborating with Design Build” title_text=”Collaborating with Design Build” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.0″]

2. Collaborating with designers

 
Once we receive a Retainer Agreement, we put you in our queue and schedule the first design meeting at your home.

We hope you’re as excited as we are to get started!
At this meeting we document your project with measurements and photos. We also discuss design details, materials and preferences in greater detail.

Once we have the Initial 2D CAD plans ready they are presented either digitally or at your home for review. Your feedback is welcome as we highly value client collaboration.

We then make revisions and updates to the design for the Walkthrough that are “Semi-final”.

Throughout the entire process, we will continue to refine the designs with 3D CAD plans to help visualize your new space and assist in making materials selections.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ disabled_on=”on|off|off” _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.0″]

3. The walkthrough meeting

 
With the semi-final designs completed, our team will schedule a “Walk Though” with the trades working on your project to come look at your home. This meeting allows for discovery and discussion about the design, scope and site conditions to obtain final pricing for you. It is a vital part of our process because we problem solve with all trades, which cuts down on surprises once we begin construction.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_image src=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/3D-Rendering-for-Design-Build.jpg” alt=”3D Rendering for Design Build” title_text=”3D Rendering for Design Build” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ disabled_on=”on|off|off” _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_image src=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Final-Design-Build-Result.jpg” alt=”Final Design Build Result” title_text=”Final Design Build Result” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.0″]

4. Kicking things off!

 
Before we hammer a single nail, our Project Manager will meet at your home for a “Pre-Start” meeting to cover all housekeeping items and prepare you to begin construction.

There’s plenty of time to ask questions and we want you to feel confident that your home is in good hands. We’ll also explain the timeline for construction and next steps.

Construction will start and before you know it and you’ll be loving your newly remodeled home.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ disabled_on=”on|off|off” _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″]

Expect more from Mosaik!

 
The buck stops here.

We take full responsibility for every aspect of your home remodel. Our entire team is 100% committed to exceeding your expectations with our work and our service.

We really do make design-build remodeling fun![/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_image src=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/Erin-Scott-2.jpg” title_text=”Erin & Scott 2″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section sticky_transition=”on”]A Mosaik Design and Remodeling truly sets the high standard when it comes to home design and remodel. Their work is impeccable and their attention to detail is uncompromised. They managed our project as if it was in their own home and we could not be happier.

– KAREN D[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”3.29.3″ sticky_transition=”on”]

Having a complementary skills of both a designer and a builder/project manager has taken away most of the stress normally associated with remodeling. The project has consistently been on time and on budget. The attention to detail has been exacting, and the craftsmen that Mosaik has brought in to work on the project have been of equally high quality.

– TAMMY V.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”3.29.3″ sticky_transition=”on”]

Erin and Scott are true professionals and a delight to work with. Erin came up with a plan that was both elegant and different from all the other ideas that we’d gathered. Scott takes great pride in both the work that is produced, onsite, and in his schedule. Both Scott and Erin are attentive, always available to help with any questions and bring great ideas and great energy.

– ILENE S.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”3.29.3″ sticky_transition=”on”]

Erin brought in some excellent ideas and Scott was ultra-attentive to the construction details, only the best quality materials and truly professional subs were used. Everything was built with safety and durability in mind. There are faster/cheaper options out there, but we are happy that we chose Erin and Scott for their quality work.

– ANTON C.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”home-right-column” _builder_version=”4.3.2″ custom_padding=”|||0px” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.7.7″ width=”80%” width_tablet=”90%” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_margin=”10%||10%||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_css_main_element=”margin-left: auto !important;||margin-right: auto !important;”]
